snippet: A couple in the Bronx has remained inseparable after 20 years, despite falling behind on bills recently and spending seven months in a shelter.
abstract: Children's Aid Society offers assistance to Bronx couple Monique and Angel Cartagena in paying their rent.
lead_paragraph: A couple in the Bronx has remained inseparable after 20 years, despite falling behind on bills recently and spending seven months in a shelter.

headline.print_headline: Love at First Sight, and Through Years of Struggles That Followed
